attributes.action: TV live show,Top vaccine scientists panel, To answer vaccine ques” from public!
attributes.additional_details: The public need transparency before ever putting total trust in this vaccine. We do not want the government to tell us, we have a right to decide and know and be given scientific, factual information from questions asked by us. Questions from all walks of life, not by only officials. Questions should be from a fair diverse background. Not 1 segment. Public questions only, with people’s names on questions- TOTAL TRANSPARENCY. It’s out right! To know our human right & freedom.
attributes.background: I want the public to have transparency. Questions answered directly from public sources only. Not government. Broadcast Live. Panel of Top scientists who researched and worked on the vaccine only. A open public poll of top 100 questions- a 3/4 hour LIVE global show. Global Media and clear answers.

rejection.details: The Government isn't responsible for organising television programming along the lines you have requested. This would be a matter for individual broadcasters.
